Steps for Eligibility

In order, to check whether any arrests, convictions or other items are eligible for sealing, you must have your entire criminal and/or arrest records. If you have your entire criminal record:

I have my record. Let's Get Started

What if I don't have my record?

If you do not have your record, check here to see what steps need to be taken to obtain your record

What happens if there are currently no items on my record that can be sealed?

Even if none of the items on your record can be sealed, there are some information that you need to know:
